name: BitcoinVB
description: What is the project about? BitcoinVB is the hardforked of bitcoin, here the main use case of bitcoinvb is peer-to-peer technology to operate with no central authority or banks; managing transactions and the issuing of BTCVB is carried out collectively by the network. BitcoinVB is open-source; its design is public, nobody owns or controls BitcoinVB and everyone can take part. Through many of its unique properties, bitcoinvb allows exciting uses that could not be covered by any previous payment system. What makes your project unique? BitcoinVB has proven and launched peer-to-peer mining's and anyone can start mining function effectively and fulfill to get rewards without necessitating trust or a central mint. However, for an entire BitcoinVB economy to be based on a fully decentralized platforms and miners benefit from the ecosystem. History of your project. Almost Bitcoin mining is coming to an end. Bitcoin made a new history and was an opportunity for few people but in fact it gave a lot of opportunities for capitalists ironically. What if we knew the value of Bitcoin from the beginning? So the new hardfork bitcoin project that we made provides a fair opportunity to more people which will be a community based P2P platform that BitcoinVB launched in August 2021. We initially started the projects in 2021, which was released as beta version with many mining teams and individuals participated, and now we have upgraded the blockchain ecosystem and increased the security of all projects under the network. All our projects with upgraded functions of BitcoinVB is released in May 2022. In 2023, BitcoinVB has successfully listed in many exchanges on the first phase and now planning to open staking programs and more advanced mining in the mainnet. What can your token be used for? BTCVB coins are created to implement into the BitcoinVB ecosystem entitled with gaining reward and benefits among the BitcoinVB community.
